resources.string: By signing up you agree to the Terms of service & Privacy Policy.including Cookie Policy.
Please enter your email here to get a new password

Wasapii is a cross-platform application for smartphones.Our purpose is to get you to meet all people next to you and then get off the phone!There are No Friend Requests and No Follows, just because we are not, yet again, another social network."
See all people within 100m close to you, find common interests, see their photos, think about the perfect ice-breaker and meet your next best friend, chill buddy, love of your life, etc. Contact them while you can – they might walk away and miss your only chance!
Chat and meet in real – then get off the phone! Because life is more beautiful outside our phones …"
\n\n Enjoy!\n Team Wasapii
